scripts.install: npm run install-server && npm run install-nasa-front-end
scripts.watch: npm run server & npm run nasa-front-end
scripts.deploy: npm run build --prefix nasa-front-end && npm start --prefix server
scripts.deploy-cluster: npm run build --prefix nasa-front-end && npm run cluster --prefix server
scripts.test: npm test --prefix server && npm run test --prefix nasa-front-end
